alert.note: Alert for Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 16 at 12:38PM CDT until April 16 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM CDT FOR YAZOO COUNTY... At 1238 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ebenezer to near Phoenix, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Vaughan around 1255 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Satartia and Bentonia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
